description.value:
The debilitations you dish out seriously impair your foes. Add the following debilitations to the list you can choose from when you use Debilitating Strike.

  • Debilitation The target gains weakness 5 to your choice of bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Vicious Debilitations]
  • Debilitation The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}.
